entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 23.
